name: Cactus Picker
description:
Cactus Picker is a game about picking all of the spikes off a cactus as fast as you can.

How to Play

Press W and O to grab with the corresponding hand. If you hit the spike correctly you will pluck the spike, otherwise you will be poked. Once you pluck all the spikes off the cactus, you win!


Controls

Q - Raise Left Hand

P - Raise Right Hand

W - Grab Left Hand

O - Grab Right Hand

R - Restart

Credits

Programming, design, art, and sound effects were done by Alex Owens.

The font is Manaspace provided by codeman38 (http://www.zone38.net/)
